scripts.audit: (npm run key-add || true) && (npm i --ignore-scripts || npm run clean && npm i --ignore-scripts) && npm audit --audit-level=high && exit $?
scripts.build: (npm run key-add || true) && npm i && npm run audit && npm run key-remove && npm run eslint
scripts.build-audit: npm run clean && npm run audit && tsc && npm pack && mv ${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.tgz ${npm_package_name}.tgz && npm run key-remove
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.compile-eslint: cd `npm run eslint-location | tail -1` && npm run build-eslint
scripts.cypress-open: npm run build && cd dist && npx cypress open
scripts.enable-eslint: cd `npm run eslint-location | tail -1`/eslintRules/ && cp -u package.json .eslintrc.js .eslintignore ../
scripts.eslint: npm run git-hook && npm run enable-eslint && npm run compile-eslint
scripts.eslint-location: ([ -d "../eslintRules/" ] && echo '../') || ([ -d "../../eslintRules/" ] && echo '../../') || ([ -d "../../../eslintRules/" ] && echo '../../../') || (echo EslintRules not found && exit 1)
scripts.git-hook: cd `npm run eslint-location | tail -1`eslintRules && npm run git-hook
scripts.key-add: local_key=`(grep -shE 'key=(.*)' ./emergya.properties ../emergya.properties ../../emergya.properties ../../../emergya.properties | head -1 2> /dev/null || echo"") | sed -E 's#key=(.*)#\1#'` && [ ! -z "$local_key" ] && (sed -i.bk -E "s#https:\/\/virtual-assisant-product\.ew\.r\.appspot\.com\/(.*)\/(.+)\.tgz(.)(\,){0,1}\$#https:\/\/virtual-assisant-product\.ew\.r\.appspot\.com\/\1\/\2.tgz?key="$local_key"\3\4#g" package.json) && rm package.json.bk || echo "No key found"
scripts.lint: cd `npm run eslint-location | tail -1`eslintRules && npm run lint
scripts.lint-local: levels=`npm run eslint-location | tail -1 | grep -o / | wc -l` && path=`pwd | rev | cut -d'/' -f 1-$levels | rev` && cd `npm run eslint-location | tail -1` && npm run lint-local --libtolint=$path/cypress/**/*
scripts.preinstall: echo "\x1b[32m[Emergya Preinstall Clear Cache NPM]" && npm cache clean --force
scripts.test: (npm run key-add || true) && (npm ls --depth=0 || npm i) && npm run key-remove && jest --useStderr && rm -r coverage
scripts.test-cloud-build: npm run clean && npm run audit && tsc && npm run key-remove
